item.description:
Sam Diegos has a fun and relaxing atmosphere. Primarily, the restaurant has Mexican food, but they also serve American as well. We can start by having a cocktail to get acquainted, and then move on to dinner! Each lady is responsible for their own tab...


It's the perfect place to get together for our first "Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun!" Womens Social Meetup Group! Besides my ideas, I'd like to get everyone's input for future Meetups. After all, It's our group!

I need solid reservations so that I can reserve a table for dinner especially since it's on a Saturday night! Meet me at the first bar located near the hostess desk

Hope all of you can make it!

Sharon
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a hat that says, "GirlsJust Wan!na Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Cocktails & Dinner at Sam Diego's in Hyannis
